clean_button.description: Wipe the button to remove dirt and ensure smooth operation.

press_button.description: Apply pressure to the button to check its functionality.

unlock_safe.description: Open the rotation door by turning it to the unlock position.

secure_safe.description: Keep the safe door as it is in locked state.

lock_safe.description: Close the rotation door by swinging it to the locked position.

access_safe.description: Keep the safe door as it is in unlocked state for the access.

clean_safe_body.description: Wipe the safe body to remove any dust or foreign particles.

full_clean_safe.description: Clean the entire safe including the button and door to maintain hygiene.
